abstract: Pfizer just announced it is giving two senior vice presidents bonuses of $1 million and $1.2 million for their deft handling of the $68 billion Wyeth buyout in the midst of the global financial crisis.
snippet: Pfizer just announced it is giving two senior vice presidents bonuses of $1 million and $1.2 million for their deft handling of the $68 billion Wyeth buyout in the midst of the global financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: From Duff Wilson, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: For Closing Wyeth Deal, Pfizer Doles Out Rewards
